alternative_names.name: The Great Ace Attorney: The Adventures of Ryuunosuke Naruhodou
Great Turnabout Trial: The Adventures of Ryūnosuke Naruhodō
大逆転裁判 -成歩堂龍ノ介の冒險-
Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken

name: Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodou Ryuunosuke no Bouken
summary: Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken is a prequel game for the Ace Attorney series of text adventure video games. Available on the Nintendo 3DS, the game is published by Capcom, directed by Shu Takumi, and produced by Shintaro Kojima. Ace Attorney veteran Kazuya Nuri returns for official art, and the soundtrack is composed by Yasumasa Kitagawa (of Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney) and Hiromitsu Maeba. It is the ninth title overall in the series.
